      • getLightnessLevel

        public boolean getLightnessLevel(ApplicationParameters.Address address,
                                 LightLightnessModelClient.LightingLightnessStatusCallback callback)
        Get lightness level value of an element
        Parameters:
        address - Address to get lightness level
        callback - Status callback
        Returns:
        true on success, false on fail or while another lightness command is in progress

      • setLightnessLevel

        public boolean setLightnessLevel(boolean reliable,
                                 ApplicationParameters.Address address,
                                 ApplicationParameters.Lightness lightness,
                                 ApplicationParameters.TID tid,
                                 ApplicationParameters.Delay delay,
                                 LightLightnessModelClient.LightingLightnessStatusCallback callback)
        Set the Light Lightness Actual state of an element
        Parameters:
        reliable - true if we need status response
        address - Address to set lightness level
        lightness - The target value of the Light Lightness Actual state
        tid - Transaction Identifier
        delay - Message execution delay in 5 millisecond steps
        callback - Status callback
        Returns:
        true on success, false on fail or while another lightness command is in progress

      • setLightnessLevel

        public boolean setLightnessLevel(boolean reliable,
                                 ApplicationParameters.Address address,
                                 ApplicationParameters.Lightness lightness,
                                 ApplicationParameters.TID tid,
                                 ApplicationParameters.Time transitionTime,
                                 ApplicationParameters.Delay delay,
                                 LightLightnessModelClient.LightingLightnessStatusCallback callback)
        Set the Light Lightness Actual state of an element
        Parameters:
        reliable - true if we need status response
        address - Address to set lightness level
        lightness - The target value of the Light Lightness Actual state
        tid - Transaction Identifier
        transitionTime - Time as how long an element shall take to transition from a present state to a new state
        delay - Message execution delay in 5 millisecond steps
        callback - Status callback
        Returns:
        true on success, false on fail or while another lightness command is in progress
